name: Line Connect Candy
description:
Your mission : is to find out 2 pictures with the same style to remove them.

Connect 2 image together no more than 3 links to make them disappear
If you can remove all pictures from the board, you will win the next level.
whenever any pair can no longer eat , the candy will be swapped positions
You can use the search support or swap positions to do not waste time.
if don't have time you will lose

Candy Line Connect classic Game is OFFLINE and FREE

+ Function 
- Challenge the eye and calculate your computing power
- There are 90 different types of game image :Candy,cake,Ice Cream
- Beautiful graphics
- Many different levels

+ New Features 
- Play mode with AI : You will fight with BOT, he is very fast and smart so you have to be careful and quick to win him . 
You will have very interesting moments

If you like it please rate for us! Thank you very much.
Hope that You can enjoy and have relaxing time with this game.
